attributes.name: OIC - Adult Prep for Ice Dance & More
attributes.description:
This class will focus on developing the skating skills of the LTS Intermediate and Advanced Adult student who seeks more expertise and strength in edge quality and turns. The curriculum will include stroking, crossovers, chasses, progressives, swing rolls and change edge as well as C-turns (Mohawks) and three turns. It will better position the student to further their exploration into advanced skating disciplines including Figures, LTS Advanced, Dance and Synchro.

Successful completion of this series will meet the prerequisite for Ice Dance One.

Prerequisite: Minimum One series of Intermediate Classes or equivalent
